data.title: North Sea Oil & Gas Excellence
data.meta_description: Ithaca Energy is a new kind of North Sea oil and gas operator and producer, committed to delivering sustainable low cost and long-term oil and gas production.
data.text:
As a leading oil and gas operator, weâ€™re in the vanguard of a new era for our industry, balancing meeting the energy needs of the UK with operating in a sustainable manner. Our goal is to maximise value through the safe, efficient and responsible production of our assets.

We are purposeful and proud, with an unwavering commitment to the North Sea.

We are a forward-thinking North Sea operator, with a powerful vision and unwavering confidence in the future of the North Sea. We know what it takes to be successful. Ambitious, purposeful and steadfast we will grow, guided by the belief that doing the right thing in the right way is our way.
